    • Method Detail

      • evaluate

        public void evaluate()
        Evaluate the state of map for the next day. Evaluates each animal. It gets rid of dead animals and shuffles the list at the end.

      • setBlock

        public boolean setBlock(int x,
                        int y,
                        Block newBlock)
        This method is used only when server asks to set block
        Parameters:
        x - coord
        y - coord
        newBlock -
        Returns:
        true if this method set the block as asked. false otherwise

      • getBlock

        public Block getBlock(int coordX,
                      int coordY)
        gets specific block based on coordinates on map
        Parameters:
        coordX - is row parameter
        coordY - is column parameter
        Returns:
        block[coordX][coordY]

      • initMap

        public void initMap(int size)
        first map gets filled with grass then bushes are added then lakes are added
        Parameters:
        size - is size of one dimension, map ends up being Dim(size x size)

                                         int coordX,
                                         int coordY)

        Parameters:
